c74object.name: imp.ltc.decode~
c74object.digest: Decode LTC (SMPTE timecode) from an audio signal
c74object.description: Use the imp.ltc.decode~ object to extract an integer time value from an LTC audio source. This information can be used to synchronize Max to an external timing source.

attribute.name: format
attribute.description: Output format of timecode value, in either timecode time or real time.

attribute.name: framerate
attribute.description: Framerate of incoming timecode signal, must be set correctly for accurate decoding.
